CustomField.formula: IF(MONTH( Purchased_Date__c ) < 10, '0'&TEXT(MONTH( Purchased_Date__c )), TEXT(MONTH( Purchased_Date__c ))) &'-'&IF(DAY( Purchased_Date__c ) < 10, '0'&TEXT(DAY( Purchased_Date__c )), TEXT(DAY( Purchased_Date__c )))&'-'&TEXT(YEAR( Purchased_Date__c ))
CustomField.label: Purchase Date
